column4: hello i was wondering if anyone knew of any torrent clients that were like BitComet for Linux  because i need one that can handle multiple torrents at the same time and not have multiple instances like the original bittorent client that comes with ubuntu default
you good to go with azureus ?
right click a torrent file and select opens with.
but you can setfirefox to pass torrents directly to azureus
dont forget to add the port to firestarter also
it's always best just to download the files from the sourceforge and just run ./azureus
just download it, cd into the files and type ./azureus
if you already have a .Azureus folder delete it
i told you the best way to do it
in the azureus folder their is a file azureus
